author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police on Tuesday stepped up security at Melakarur Sub-Registrar office here based on demand of a senior official of Department of Registration from Tiruchi. V. Kalaiselvi, AIG of Registration, had visited Melakarur to verify the documents on complaints that many of the documents registered at Melakarur were not given to persons’ concerned for long. She reportedly sought police protection because of “unfriendly situation” when she visited the office for inspection.

Meanwhile, a group of people including land dealers presented petition to Ms. Kalaiselvi in Karur on Tuesday. They complained that a large number of registered documents were unnecessarily kept in the Sub-Registrar officer for several weeks without any valid reason.
title: Security stepped up
